Project_Title: Differential expression of exosomal miRNAs between medulloblastoma patients and healthy controls (human)
Project_Description:
We characterized circulating exosomal miRNA profiles by miRNA-seq to identify those differentially expressed in children with MB relative to heathy controls
Overall design: Plasma samples from 4 medulloblastoma patients and 4 healthy controls were enrolled in the experiment. Exosomes were extracted, total RNA were isolated from the identified exosomes.miRNA profilings were performed.
